sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PDF_P101M ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY__69323 , DAT_CD , NAT_AMT_MN , WRKP_NTF , RGN_PMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey69323# , #datCd# , #natAmtMn# , #wrkpNtf# , #rgnPmt# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PDF_P101M SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY__69323=#systemkey69323# , DAT_CD=#datCd# , NAT_AMT_MN=#natAmtMn# , WRKP_NTF=#wrkpNtf# , RGN_PMT=#rgnPmt# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY__69323=#systemkey69323# AND DAT_CD=#datCd# AND NAT_AMT_MN=#natAmtMn#

sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY__69323 , DAT_CD , NAT_AMT_MN , WRKP_NTF , RGN_PMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PDF_P101M WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY__69323=#systemkey69323# AND DAT_CD=#datCd# AND NAT_AMT_MN=#natAmtMn#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY__69323 , DAT_CD , NAT_AMT_MN , WRKP_NTF , RGN_PMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PDF_P101M WHERE 1=1

YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY__69323 DESC , DAT_CD DESC , NAT_AMT_MN DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#
